name: Squares Kill
description:
Game for Ludum Dare 40

Theme: The more you have, the worse it is

Controls:

Mouse: Aim

Click: Shoot

W,A,S,D: Movement

Kill enemies squares or survivor for a litle time for pass each level.

Destroy brown squares to drop power ups, but this power ups buff the enemies too (mechanic for theme).

Red power up, up player damage and up speed enemies.

Yellow power up, up player speed and dec spawn time for enemies.
